long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share The Web is a lightweight social media application that lets you share any Web URL via a quick an easy keyboard shortcut. 

Use ALT + W on Windows, OPTION + W on Macs.

How it works:
(1) Download the Chrome extension and PIN it to your browser for easy access and un-intrusive notifications.

(2) Go to https://shareweb.app/ and create a profile. Once you've done so Sign into the chrome
extension by click the icon, or toggling ALT + w (windows) OPTION + w mac.

(2) You are now signed in. Invite friends via email, or make Friend Requests to those already on the network.

(3) Find something you love? ALT + w on Windows, or OPTIONS + w on Mac. Toggles a modal and allows you to send the link and message to your friend.. 

(4) Stay connected with intrusive notifications displayed on your Chrome Extension icon.


You don't have to be on Twitter, or Instagram, or in Email to share the great things you find on the web with your friends. Share content on any site with one simple powerful command,  and stay connected to what your friends are sharing with you through your chrome extension.
